raw_comment: This graph is a scatter plot graph with a dividing line. The graph showed a comparison between the response from the younger and the older generations. The majority of the younger generation from the 21 countries thinks that the world is getting better, whereas the majority of the older generation thinks that the world is barely getting better. This graph is used to show how different generations view the world differently, mainly because of the different experiences that they went through and the changes they see that happened to the country they currently live in. In general, people who lives in Africa are more optimistic (India and Nigeria have a high percentage of optimism and a higher percentage from older generation than younger generation) because the shift in living condition and economic growth that the people have witnessed. The audience of the graph may be people from a wide range of countries and ages.
ace_sentences: This graph is a scatter plot.
This graph has a dividing line.
This graph compares responses from younger generations and older generations.
The responses come from 21 countries.
In most of the 21 countries, most younger people think that the world is getting better.
In most of the 21 countries, most older people think that the world is barely getting better.
This graph shows that different generations view the world differently.
Different generations have different experiences.
People see changes in the country where they live.
These changes can affect how people view the world.
In general, people who live in Africa are more optimistic.
India has a high percentage of optimism.
Nigeria has a high percentage of optimism.
In India, the percentage of optimism is higher in the older generation than in the younger generation.
In Nigeria, the percentage of optimism is higher in the older generation than in the younger generation.
People in these countries have witnessed a shift in living conditions.
People in these countries have witnessed economic growth.
These observations can increase optimism.
The audience of the graph may include people from many countries.
The audience of the graph may include people of many ages.
